name: Cursed Kings
description:
The project is a mix between Reigns and a city builder in LoopHero like ambiance made in 24H. This game is a prototype and I May extend this version later.

In the game you play as king that are cursed:

  • die at 80
  • will suffer from calamities evrey 100 years.

Every year, your population will grow (as long as there is space) and consume food.

To win, you only have to handle your kingdom correctly for 1000 years without reaching 100 cursed.

If there is an issue you can download the .exe version
